tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
comments: Prof. Threlkeld was a tough grader but a good teacher. She definitely gets the college writing process across. She can be a bit intimidating, but she encourages using her office hours a lot. Reading the syllabus is a must in her class.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She comes across as clear and reasonable, but her comments and grading style beg to differ. Expect a ton of reading and revising. She is a tough grader, but not impossible to please. I definitely recommend visiting office hours or she will not care much for you.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She was not a hard professor as long as you read and bring your material. She is very clear in class but i have no interest in history. Not the nicest but not too hard

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: The readings for the course were very manageable, but she was a very hard grader, especially for a 100 level class. Having said that I do believe she pushed every student to do the best that they could and her lectures were always to the point and incorporated class discussion flawlessly with them

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: A lot of document reading. Do your reading, speak up in class, and write clear papers, and an \'A\' is very attainable.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Prof. Threlkeld is great at what she does. She stands as a professor who understands that students are fantastic resources for one another, and really wants them to be able to illuminate one anothers\' experiences. She is great at starting discussion and knowing how to be involved just enough to keep the discussion on track.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: New to Denison but an amazing professor. Great at stimulating discussion and conversation - I\'ll hopefully get a chance to take her again. A fair amount of work but you\'ll get a lot out of the class. Great at answering questions and encouraging all sides of a debate.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is newer to Denison but still awesome! Definitely take a class with her if you can. Her classes are a fair amount of work for sure but I think its worth it. Knows so much about history, especailly womens history.
